price: Nokorε sε, Yεbεboa Y’asomafoͻ no ne wͻn a wͻagye adie no ama wͻn adi nkonim wͻ wiase asetena yi mu, εne Ɛda a Adansefoͻ no bɛgyina hͻ no.
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā lananṣuru rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wayawma yaqūmu al-ashhādu
